scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently -k "UI_PORT=1420 npm start -w ui" "npm run launch"
scripts.network:android: npm run build:happ && concurrently -k "UI_PORT=1420 npm start -w ui" "npm run tauri dev --release" "npm run tauri android dev --release"
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:webhapp: npm run build:zomes && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
